original: 09,013.003c na jahuḥ samare pārthaṃ vadhyamānāḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: na jahuḥ samare pārtham vadhyamānāḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
te rjunam ratha vaṃśena droṇaputra purogamāḥ

original: 09,013.005a tais tu kṣiptāḥ śarā rājan kārtasvaravibhūṣitāḥ

original: 09,013.007c yugaṃ caivānukarṣaṃ ca śarabhūtam abhūt tadā

original: 09,013.009a sa rathaḥ sarvato bhāti citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sa rathaḥ sarvatas bhāti citra puṅkhaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,013.010c avākirat tāṃ pṛtanāṃ megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam

original: 09,013.013a cakrāṇāṃ patatāṃ caiva yugānāṃ ca dharātale

original: 09,013.013c tūṇīrāṇāṃ patākānāṃ dhvajānāṃ ca rathaiḥ saha

original: 09,013.013d*0079_01 īṣāṇāṃ cāpi yoktrāṇāṃ veṇūnāṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: īṣāṇām ca api yoktrāṇām veṇūnām ca api sarvaśas

original: 09,013.013d*0079_02 bhujānāṃ śirasāṃ caiva chattrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ saha

original: 09,013.013d*0079_03 tatra kruddhasya pārthasya agamyā samabhūd dharā
analyzed: tatra kruddhasya pārthasya agamyā samabhūt dharā

analyzed: akṣāṇām atha yoktrāṇām pratodānām ca sarvaśas

original: 09,013.015c bhujānāṃ ca mahārāja skandhānāṃ ca samantataḥ

analyzed: sarveṣām patatām ca eva chattrāṇām ca samantataḥ

original: 09,013.016a chatrāṇāṃ vyajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukuṭānāṃ ca rāśayaḥ
analyzed: chatrāṇām vyajanaiḥ sārdham mukuṭānām ca rāśayaḥ

original: 09,013.016d*0081_01 tataḥ kruddhasya pārthasya rathamārge viśāṃ pate

original: 09,013.018a hatvā tu samare pārthaḥ sahasre dve paraṃtapa
analyzed: hatvā tu samare pārthaḥ sahasre dve paraṃtapa

original: 09,013.019a yathā hi bhagavān agnir jagad dagdhvā carācaram
analyzed: yathā hi bhagavān agniḥ jagat dagdhvā carācaram

original: 09,013.019c vidhūmo dṛśyate rājaṃs tathā pārtho mahārathaḥ

original: 09,013.020a drauṇis tu samare dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavasya parākramam

original: 09,013.021a tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau śvetāśvau dhanvināṃ varau

jīmūtānām yathā vṛṣṭiḥ tapānte bharata ṛṣabha
anyonya spardhinau tau tu śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 09,013.024a tayor yuddhaṃ mahārāja ciraṃ samam ivābhavat
analyzed: tayoḥ yuddham mahā rāja ciram samam iva abhavat

original: 09,013.024c astrāṇāṃ saṃgamaś caiva ghoras tatrābhavan mahān
analyzed: astrāṇām saṃgamaḥ ca eva ghoraḥ tatra abhavat mahān

original: 09,013.025c vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhir drauṇir vivyādha bhārata
analyzed: vāsudevam ca daśabhiḥ drauṇiḥ vivyādha bhārata

original: 09,013.026a tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: tatas prahasya bībhatsuḥ vyākṣipat gāṇḍivam dhanuḥ

original: 09,013.026d*0082_02 so 'sṛjat sāyakān saṃkhye arjuno jayatāṃ varaḥ

analyzed: caturbhiḥ sāyakaiḥ ca eva tāḍayām āsa ghoṭakān

original: 09,013.027c mṛdupūrvaṃ tataś cainaṃ tribhir vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: mṛdu pūrvam tatas ca enam tribhiḥ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ

original: 09,013.028a hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan droṇaputras tv ayasmayam
analyzed: hata aśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan droṇaputraḥ tu ayasmayam
yama daṇḍa nibham ghoram śatru sainya bhayaṃkaram

original: 09,013.030a sa cchinnaṃ musalaṃ dṛṣṭvā drauṇiḥ paramakopanaḥ
analyzed: sa chinnam musalam dṛṣṭvā drauṇiḥ parama kopanaḥ
ādade parigham ghoram naga indra śikhara upamam

original: 09,013.031a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ parighaṃ prekṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: tam antakam iva kruddham parigham prekṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
arjunaḥ tvaritaḥ jaghne pañcabhiḥ sāyaka uttamaiḥ

original: 09,013.032a sa cchinnaḥ patito bhūmau pārthabāṇair mahāhave
analyzed: sa chinnaḥ patitaḥ bhūmau pārtha bāṇaiḥ mahā āhave

original: 09,013.033a tato 'parais tribhir bāṇair drauṇiṃ vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: paraiḥ tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ drauṇim vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 09,013.033e na saṃbhrāntas tadā drauṇiḥ pauruṣe sve vyavasthitaḥ

original: 09,013.034a sudharmā tu tato rājan bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: sudharmā tu tatas rājan bhāradvājam mahā ratham

original: 09,013.035a tatas tu suratho 'py ājau pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu surathaḥ pi ājau pāñcālānām mahā rathaḥ

original: 09,013.036a vikarṣan vai dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
analyzed: vikarṣan vai dhanuḥ śreṣṭham sarva bhāra saham dṛḍham

original: 09,013.037a surathaṃ tu tataḥ kruddham āpatantaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: suratham tu tatas kruddham āpatantam mahā ratham

original: 09,013.038c udvīkṣya surathaṃ roṣād dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
analyzed: udvīkṣya suratham roṣāt dhanuḥ jyām avamṛjya ca
mumoca tīkṣṇam nārācam yama daṇḍa sama dyutim

original: 09,013.040a tatas taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau nārācena samāhatam
analyzed: tatas tam patitam bhūmau nārācena samāhatam

original: 09,013.041a tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre droṇaputraḥ pratāpavān

original: 09,013.041c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ tam eva rathināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: āruroha ratham tūrṇam tam eva rathinām varaḥ

original: 09,013.043a tatra yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
analyzed: tatra yuddham mahat ca āsīt arjunasya paraiḥ saha

original: 09,013.044c yad eko yugapad vīrān samayodhayad arjunaḥ
analyzed: yat ekaḥ yugapad vīrān samayodhayat arjunaḥ

original: 09,013.045a vimardas tu mahān āsīd arjunasya paraiḥ saha
analyzed: vimardaḥ tu mahān āsīt arjunasya paraiḥ saha

duryodhanaḥ mahā rāja dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ ca pārṣataḥ
cakratuḥ su mahat yuddham śara śakti samākulam
tayoḥ āsan mahā rāja śara dhārāḥ sahasraśas
ambudānām yathā kāle jala dhārāḥ samantataḥ

original: 09,014.003a rājā tu pārṣataṃ viddhvā śaraiḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: rājā tu pārṣatam viddhvā śaraiḥ pañcabhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 09,014.005c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ parivavruḥ sma pārṣatam
analyzed: mahatyā senayā sārdham parivavruḥ sma pārṣatam

original: 09,014.006a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvato 'tirathair bhṛśam
analyzed: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvatas tirathaiḥ bhṛśam

original: 09,014.008a tatrāpi sumahad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tatra api su mahat yuddham ghora rūpam viśām pate

original: 09,014.010c yodhayām āsa rājendra vīryeṇa ca balena ca
analyzed: yodhayām āsa rāja indra vīryeṇa ca balena ca

original: 09,014.011c trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta ke cit tatra mahārathāḥ
analyzed: trātāram na adhyagacchanta ke cid tatra mahā rathāḥ

original: 09,014.012a tatas tu nakulaḥ śūro dharmarāje prapīḍite
analyzed: tatas tu nakulaḥ śūraḥ dharmarāje prapīḍite

vivyādha ca enam daśabhiḥ smayamānaḥ stanāntare
sarva pāraśavaiḥ bāṇaiḥ karmāra parimārjitaiḥ

original: 09,014.015a śalyas tu pīḍitas tena svasrīyeṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: śalyaḥ tu pīḍitaḥ tena svasrīyeṇa mahātmanā

tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā sātyakiḥ

original: 09,014.017c diśaś ca pradiśaś caiva kampayānāṃś ca medinīm
analyzed: diśaḥ ca pradiśaḥ ca eva kampayānān ca medinīm

original: 09,014.018a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā bhīmasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram tribhiḥ viddhvā bhīmasenam ca saptabhiḥ

original: 09,014.018c sātyakiṃ ca śatenājau sahadevaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sātyakim ca śatena ājau sahadevam tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,014.019a tatas tu saśaraṃ cāpaṃ nakulasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu sa śaram cāpam nakulasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 09,014.019e tad aśīryata vicchinnaṃ dhanuḥ śalyasya sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: tat aśīryata vicchinnam dhanuḥ śalyasya sāyakaiḥ

original: 09,014.021a yudhiṣṭhiras tu madreśaṃ sahadevaś ca māriṣa
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu madra īśam sahadevaḥ ca māriṣa

original: 09,014.021c daśabhir daśabhir bāṇair urasy enam avidhyatām
analyzed: daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ urasi enam avidhyatām

original: 09,014.022a bhīmasenas tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā sātyakir navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ tatas ṣaṣṭyā sātyakiḥ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,014.023a madrarājas tataḥ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: madra rājaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ sātyakim navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,014.024a athāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda māriṣa
analyzed: atha asya sa śaram cāpam muṣṭau ciccheda māriṣa

original: 09,014.024c hayāṃś ca caturaḥ saṃkhye preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
analyzed: hayān ca caturaḥ saṃkhye preṣayām āsa mṛtyave

original: 09,014.026a mādrīputrau tu saṃrabdhau bhīmasenaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
analyzed: mādrī putrau tu saṃrabdhau bhīmasenam ca pāṇḍavam

original: 09,014.026c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kauravya vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram ca kauravya vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,014.027c yad enaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nābhyavartanta saṃyuge
analyzed: yat enam sahitāḥ pārthāḥ na abhyavartanta saṃyuge
atha anyam ratham āsthāya sātyakiḥ satya vikramaḥ
pīḍitān pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā madra rāja vaśam gatān
abhidudrāva vegena madrāṇām adhipam balī
āpatantam ratham tasya śalyaḥ samiti śobhanaḥ

original: 09,014.029c pratyudyayau rathenaiva matto mattam iva dvipam
analyzed: pratyudyayau rathena eva mattaḥ mattam iva dvipam

original: 09,014.030c sātyakeś caiva śūrasya madrāṇām adhipasya ca
analyzed: sātyakeḥ ca eva śūrasya madrāṇām adhipasya ca

original: 09,014.031c vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: vivyādha daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: 09,014.032a madrarājas tu subhṛśaṃ viddhas tena mahātmanā
analyzed: madra rājaḥ tu su bhṛśam viddhaḥ tena mahātmanā

tatas pārthāḥ mahā iṣvāsāḥ sātvata abhisṛtam nṛpam
abhyadravan rathaiḥ tūrṇam mātulam vadha kāmyayā
tatas āsīt parāmardaḥ tumulaḥ śoṇita udakaḥ
śūrāṇām yudhyamānānām siṃhānām iva nardatām
teṣām āsīt mahā rāja vyatikṣepaḥ parasparam
siṃhānām āmiṣa īpsūnām kūjatām iva saṃyuge
teṣām bāṇa sahasra oghaiḥ ākīrṇā vasudhā bhavat

original: 09,014.036c antarikṣaṃ ca sahasā bāṇabhūtam abhūt tadā

yudhiṣṭhiram bhīma balam prasahya
vivyādha vīram hṛdaye tivegam
śareṇa sūrya agni sama prabheṇa
tatas tividdhaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pi
su saṃprayuktena śareṇa rājan
tatas sa viddhaḥ vidhi dharma sūnunā
mahā balena indra parākrameṇa
jaghāna madra adhipatim mahātmā
mudam ca lebhe ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām
tatas muhūrtāt iva pārthiva indraḥ
labdhvā saṃjñām krodha saṃrakta netraḥ
śatena pārtham tvaritaḥ jaghāna
tvaran tatas dharmasutaḥ mahātmā
śalyasya kruddhaḥ navabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ

original: 09,016.019c bhittvā hy uras tapanīyaṃ ca varma;
analyzed: bhittvā hi uraḥ tapanīyam ca varma
jaghāna ṣaḍbhiḥ tu aparaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
tatas tu madra adhipatiḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ
dhanuḥ vikṛṣya vyasṛjat pṛṣatkān
dvābhyām kṣurābhyām ca tathā eva rājñaḥ
ciccheda cāpam kuru puṃgavasya
navam tatas samare pragṛhya
rājā dhanuḥ ghorataram mahātmā
śalyam tu viddhvā niśitaiḥ samantāt
yathā mahā indraḥ namucim śita agraiḥ
tatas tu śalyaḥ navabhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
bhīmasya rājñaḥ ca yudhiṣṭhirasya
nikṛtya raukme paṭu varmaṇī tayoḥ
vidārayām āsa bhujau mahātmā
pareṇa jvalita arka tejasā
kṣureṇa rājñaḥ dhanuḥ unmamātha
kṛpaḥ ca tasya eva jaghāna sūtam
ṣaḍbhiḥ śaraiḥ saḥ abhimukham papāta
madra adhipaḥ ca api yudhiṣṭhirasya
śaraiḥ caturbhiḥ nijaghāna vāhān
vāhān ca hatvā vyakarot mahātmā
yodha kṣayam dharmasutasya rājñaḥ

original: 09,016.024d*0091_01 yad adbhutaṃ karma na śakyam anyaiḥ
analyzed: yat adbhutam karma na śakyam anyaiḥ
su duḥsaham tat kṛtavantam ekam
śalyam narendraḥ sa viṣaṇṇa bhāvāt
vicintayām āsa mṛdaṅgaketuḥ
kim etat indrāvarajasya vākyam
mogham bhavati adya vidheḥ balena
jahi iti śalyam hi avadat tadā ājau
na loka nāthasya vacaḥ nyathā syāt
tathā kṛte rājani bhīmasenaḥ
madra adhipasya āśu tatas mahātmā
chittvā dhanuḥ vegavatā śareṇa
dvābhyām avidhyat su bhṛśam narendram
atha apareṇa asya jahāra yantuḥ
kāyāt śiraḥ saṃnahanīya madhyāt
jaghāna ca aśvān caturaḥ sa śīghram
tathā bhṛśam kupitaḥ bhīmasenaḥ
tam agraṇīḥ sarva dhanurdharāṇām
ekam carantam samare tivegam
bhīmaḥ śatena vyakirat śarāṇām
mādrī putraḥ sahadevaḥ tathā eva
taiḥ sāyakaiḥ mohitam vīkṣya śalyam
bhīmaḥ śaraiḥ asya cakarta varma
bhīmaḥ śaraiḥ niśitaiḥ tigma tejaiḥ
śilīmukhaiḥ asya cakarta varma
sa bhīmasenena nikṛtta varmā
madra adhipaḥ carma sahasra tāram
pragṛhya khaḍgam ca rathāt mahātmā
praskandya kuntī sutam abhyadhāvat
chittvā ratha īṣām nakulasya saḥ tha
yudhiṣṭhiram bhīma balaḥ bhyadhāvat
tam ca api rājānam atha utpatantam
kruddham yathā eva antakam āpatantam
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ draupadeyāḥ śikhaṇḍī
śineḥ ca naptā sahasā parīyuḥ
atha asya carma apratimam nyakṛntat
bhīmaḥ mahātmā daśabhiḥ pṛṣatkaḥ
khaḍgam ca bhallaiḥ nicakarta muṣṭau
nadan prahṛṣṭaḥ tava sainya madhye
tat karma bhīmasya samīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ
te pāṇḍavānām pravarāḥ ratha oghāḥ
nādam ca cakruḥ bhṛśam utsmayantaḥ
śaṅkhān ca dadhmuḥ śaśi saṃnikāśān
tena atha śabdena vibhīṣaṇena
tava abhitaptam balam a prahṛṣṭam
sveda abhibhūtam rudhira ukṣita aṅgam
visaṃjña kalpam ca tathā viṣaṇṇam
sa madra rājaḥ sahasā avakīrṇaḥ
bhīma agragaiḥ pāṇḍava yodha mukhyaiḥ
yudhiṣṭhirasya abhimukham javena
siṃhaḥ yathā mṛga hetoḥ prayātaḥ
sa dharmarājaḥ nihata aśva sūtam
krodhena dīpta jvalana prakāśam
dṛṣṭvā tu madra adhipatim sa tūrṇam
samabhyadhāvat tam arim balena
govinda vākyam tvaritam vicintya
dadhre matim śalya vināśanāya
sa dharmarājaḥ nihata aśva sūte
rathe tiṣṭham śaktim eva abhikāṅkṣan
tat ca api śalyasya niśamya karma
mahātmanaḥ bhāgam atha avaśiṣṭam
smṛtvā manaḥ śalya vadhe yata ātmā
yathā uktam indrāvarajasya cakre
sa dharmarājaḥ maṇi hema daṇḍām
jagrāha śaktim kanaka prakāśām
netre ca dīpte sahasā vivṛtya
madra adhipam kruddha manāḥ niraikṣat
nirīkṣitaḥ vai naradeva rājñā
pūta ātmanā nirhṛta kalmaṣeṇa
abhūt na yat bhasmasāt madra rājaḥ
tat adbhutam me pratibhāti rājan
tatas tu śaktim rucira ugra daṇḍām
maṇi pravāla ujjvalitām pradīptām
cikṣepa vegāt su bhṛśam mahātmā
madra adhipāya pravaraḥ kurūṇām
dīptām atha enām mahatā balena
sa visphuliṅgām sahasā patantīm
praikṣanta sarve kuravaḥ sametā
yathā yuga ante mahatīm iva ulkām
tām kālarātrīm iva pāśa hastām
yamasya dhātrīm iva ca ugra rūpām
sa brahmadaṇḍa pratimām amoghām
sasarja yattaḥ yudhi dharmarājaḥ
gandha sraj agrya āsana pāna bhojanaiḥ
abhyarcitām pāṇḍu sutaiḥ prayatnāt
saṃvartaka agni pratimām jvalantīm
kṛtyām atharva āṅgirasīm iva ugrām
īśāna hetoḥ pratinirmitām tām
tvaṣṭrā ripūṇām asu deha bhakṣām
bhūmi antarikṣa ādi jalāśayāni
prasahya bhūtāni nihantum īśām
ghaṇṭā patākā maṇi vajra bhājam
vaiḍūrya citrām tapanīya daṇḍām
tvaṣṭrā prayatnāt niyamena kḷptām
brahma dviṣām anta karīm amoghām
bala prayatnāt adhirūḍha vegām
mantraiḥ ca ghoraiḥ abhimantrayitvā
sasarja mārgeṇa ca tām pareṇa
vadhāya madra adhipateḥ tadānīm
hataḥ si asau iti abhigarjamānaḥ
rudraḥ ntakāya anta karam yathā iṣum
prasārya bāhum su dṛḍham su pāṇim
krodhena nṛtyan iva dharmarājaḥ
sphurat prabhā maṇḍalam aṃśu jālaiḥ
dharmātmajaḥ madra vināśa kāle
pura traya proddharaṇe purastān
māheśvaram rūpam abhūt tadānīm
āvartana ākuñcita bāhu daṇḍaḥ
viśāla vakṣāḥ bhagavān haraḥ yathā
su durnirīkṣyaḥ bhavat arjuna agrajaḥ
tām sarva śaktyā prahitām sa śaktim
yudhiṣṭhireṇa aprativārya vīryām
pratigrahāya abhinanarda śalyaḥ
samyak hutām agniḥ iva ājya dhārām
sā tasya marmāṇi vidārya śubhram
uraḥ viśālam ca tathā eva varma
viveśa gām toyam iva aprasaktā
yaśaḥ viśālam nṛpateḥ dahantī
nāsā akṣi karṇa āsya viniḥsṛtena
prasyandatā ca vraṇa saṃbhavena
saṃsikta gātraḥ rudhireṇa saḥ bhūt
krauñcaḥ yathā skanda hataḥ mahā adriḥ

original: 09,016.051a prasārya bāhū sa rathād gato gāṃ;

bhīmam eva abhyavartanta raṇe nye tu padātayaḥ
prakṣveḍya āsphoṭya saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vīra lokam yiyāsavaḥ
āsādya bhīmasenam tu saṃrabdhāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ

original: 09,018.042c dhārtarāṣṭrā vinedur hi nānyāṃ cākathayan kathām
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ vineduḥ hi na anyām ca akathayan kathām
nigṛhītum tadā kruddhāḥ samantāt paryavārayan

original: 09,018.042e parivārya raṇe bhīmaṃ nijaghnus te samantataḥ
analyzed: parivārya raṇe bhīmam nijaghnuḥ te samantataḥ
sa vadhyamānaḥ samare padāti gaṇa saṃvṛtaḥ

original: 09,018.043c na cacāla rathopasthe maināka iva parvataḥ
analyzed: na cacāla rathopasthe mainākaḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 09,018.044a te tu kruddhā mahārāja pāṇḍavasya mahāratham
analyzed: te tu kruddhāḥ mahā rāja pāṇḍavasya mahā ratham

original: 09,018.044c nigrahītuṃ pracakrur hi yodhāṃś cānyān avārayan
analyzed: nigrahītum pracakruḥ hi yodhān ca anyān avārayan

original: 09,018.045a akrudhyata raṇe bhīmas tais tadā paryavasthitaiḥ
analyzed: akrudhyata raṇe bhīmaḥ taiḥ tadā paryavasthitaiḥ
saḥ vatīrya rathāt tūrṇam padātiḥ samavasthitaḥ
jātarūpa paricchannām pragṛhya mahatīm gadām
avadhīt tāvakān yodhān daṇḍa pāṇiḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 09,018.047a rathāśvadvipahīnāṃs tu tān bhīmo gadayā balī
analyzed: ratha aśva dvipa hīnān tu tān bhīmaḥ gadayā balī
viprahīna ratha aśvān tān narān sa puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
bhīmasenaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ gadayā vajra kalpayā
ekaviṃśati sāhasrān padātīn avapothayat
hatvā tat puruṣa anīkam bhīmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumnam puraskṛtya nacirāt pratyadṛśyata
pādātāḥ nihatāḥ bhūmau śiśyire rudhira ukṣitāḥ
saṃbhagnāḥ iva vātena karṇikārāḥ su puṣpitāḥ
nānā puṣpa srajā upetāḥ nānā kuṇḍala dhāriṇaḥ
nānā jātyāḥ hatāḥ tatra nānā deśa samāgatāḥ
patākā dhvaja saṃchannam padātīnām mahat balam
nikṛttam vibabhau tatra ghora rūpam bhayānakam
yudhiṣṭhira purogāḥ tu sarva sainya mahā rathāḥ
abhyadhāvat mahātmānam putram duryodhanam tava

original: 09,018.053a te sarve tāvakān dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsān parāṅmukhān
analyzed: te sarve tāvakān dṛṣṭvā mahā iṣvāsān parāṅmukhān
samabhyadhāvan tvaritāḥ yuddhāya jita kāśinaḥ
na abhyavartanta te putram velā iva makara ālayam

original: 09,018.054a tad adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam
analyzed: tat adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam

original: 09,018.054c yad ekaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā na śekur ativartitum
analyzed: yat ekam sahitāḥ pārthāḥ na śekuḥ ativartitum
na ati dūra apayātam tu kṛta buddhim palāyane
duryodhanaḥ svakam sainyam abravīt bhṛśa vikṣatam

original: 09,018.056a na taṃ deśaṃ prapaśyāmi pṛthivyāṃ parvateṣu vā
analyzed: na tam deśam prapaśyāmi pṛthivyām parvateṣu vā

original: 09,018.056c yatra yātān na vo hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
analyzed: yatra yātān na vaḥ hanyuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kim sṛtena vaḥ

original: 09,018.057a alpaṃ ca balam eteṣāṃ kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśavikṣatau
analyzed: alpam ca balam eteṣām kṛṣṇau ca bhṛśa vikṣatau

original: 09,018.057c yadi sarve 'tra tiṣṭhāmo dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
analyzed: yadi sarve tiṣṭhāmaḥ dhruvaḥ naḥ vijayaḥ bhavet

original: 09,018.058a viprayātāṃs tu vo bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛtakilbiṣān
analyzed: viprayātān tu vaḥ bhinnān pāṇḍavāḥ kṛta kilbiṣān

original: 09,018.058c anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyo naḥ samare sthitam
analyzed: anusṛtya haniṣyanti śreyaḥ naḥ samare sthitam

original: 09,018.059a śṛṇudhvaṃ kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam kṣatriyāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ

original: 09,018.059c yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca mārayaty antakaḥ sadā
analyzed: yadā śūram ca bhīrum ca mārayati antakaḥ sadā

original: 09,018.059e ko nu mūḍho na yudhyeta puruṣaḥ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu mūḍhaḥ na yudhyeta puruṣaḥ kṣatriyabruvaḥ

original: 09,018.060a śreyo no bhīmasenasya kruddhasya pramukhe sthitam
analyzed: śreyaḥ naḥ bhīmasenasya kruddhasya pramukhe sthitam
sukhaḥ sāṃgrāmikaḥ mṛtyuḥ kṣatra dharmeṇa yudhyatām
martyena avaśya martavyam gṛheṣu api kadā cana
yudhyataḥ kṣatra dharmeṇa mṛtyuḥ eṣa sanātanaḥ

original: 09,018.060e jitveha sukham āpnoti hataḥ pretya mahat phalam
analyzed: jitvā iha sukham āpnoti hataḥ pretya mahat phalam

original: 09,018.061a na yuddhadharmāc chreyān vai panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ
analyzed: na yuddha dharmāt śreyān vai panthāḥ svargasya kauravāḥ

original: 09,018.061c acireṇa jitāṃl lokān hato yuddhe samaśnute
analyzed: acireṇa jitān lokān hataḥ yuddhe samaśnute

original: 09,018.062a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya pūjayitvā ca pārthivāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasya pūjayitvā ca pārthivāḥ
punar eva anvavartanta pāṇḍavān ātatāyinaḥ
tān āpatataḥ eva āśu vyūḍha anīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
pratyudyayuḥ tadā pārthāḥ jaya gṛdhrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
dhanaṃjayaḥ rathena ājau abhyavartata vīryavān

original: 09,018.064c viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvaṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
analyzed: viśrutam triṣu lokeṣu gāṇḍīvam vikṣipan dhanuḥ

original: 09,018.065a mādrīputrau ca śakuniṃ sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: mādrī putrau ca śakunim sātyakiḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 09,018.065c javenābhyapatan hṛṣṭā yato vai tāvakaṃ balam
analyzed: javena abhyapatan hṛṣṭāḥ yatas vai tāvakam balam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
saṃnivṛtte bala oghe tu śālvaḥ mleccha gaṇa adhipaḥ
abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ pāṇḍūnām su mahat balam
āsthāya su mahā nāgam prabhinnam parvata upamam
dṛptam airāvata prakhyam amitra gaṇa mardanam
yaḥ sau mahā bhadra kula prasūtaḥ
su pūjitaḥ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa nityam
su kalpitaḥ śāstra viniścaya jñaiḥ
sadā upavāhyaḥ samareṣu rājan
airāvatam daitya gaṇān vimṛdnan
śakraḥ yathā saṃjanayan bhayāni
tam āsthitaḥ rāja varaḥ babhūva
yathā udaya sthaḥ savitā kṣapā ante
sa tena nāga pravareṇa rājan
abhyudyayau pāṇḍu sutān samantāt
śitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ vidadāra ca api
mahā indra vajra pratimaiḥ su ghoraiḥ
tatas śarān vai sṛjataḥ mahā raṇe
yodhān ca rājan nayataḥ yamāya
tatas śarān vai sṛjatā nṛpeṇa
yodhāḥ samastāḥ gamitāḥ yama ālayam
na asya antaram dadṛśuḥ sve pare vā
yathā purā vajradharasya daityāḥ
airāvaṇa sthasya camū vimarde
daityāḥ purā vāsavasya iva rājan
te pāṇḍavāḥ somakāḥ sṛñjayāḥ ca
tam eva nāgam dadṛśuḥ samantāt
sahasraśas vai vicarantam ekam
yathā mahā indrasya gajam samīpe
saṃdrāvyamāṇam tu balam pareṣām
parīta kalpam vibabhau samantāt
na eva avatasthe samare bhṛśam bhayāt
vimardamānam tu parasparam tadā
tatas prabhagnā sahasā mahā camūḥ
sā pāṇḍavī tena narādhipena
diśaḥ catasraḥ sahasā pradhāvitā
gaja indra vegam tam a pārayantī
dṛṣṭvā ca tām vegavatā prabhagnām
sarve tvadīyāḥ yudhi yodha mukhyāḥ
apūjayan tatra narādhipam tam
dadhmuḥ ca śaṅkhām śaśi saṃnikāśān
śrutvā ninādam tu atha kauravāṇām
harṣāt vimuktam saha śaṅkha śabdaiḥ
senāpatiḥ pāṇḍava sṛñjayānām
pāñcāla putraḥ na mamarṣa roṣāt

original: 09,019.011a tatas tu taṃ vai dviradaṃ mahātmā;
analyzed: tatas tu tam vai dviradam mahātmā
pratyudyayau tvaramāṇaḥ jayāya
jambhaḥ yathā śakra samāgame vai
nāga indram airāvaṇam indra vāhyam
tam āpatantam sahasā tu dṛṣṭvā
pāñcāla rājam yudhi rāja siṃhaḥ

original: 09,019.012c taṃ vai dvipaṃ preṣayām āsa tūrṇaṃ;
analyzed: tam vai dvipam preṣayām āsa tūrṇam
vadhāya rājan drupada ātmajasya
sa tam dvipam sahasā abhyāpatantam
avidhyat arka pratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
karmāra dhautaiḥ niśitaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ
nārāca mukhyaiḥ tribhiḥ ugra vegaiḥ
tatas parān pañca śitān mahātmā
nārāca mukhyān visasarja kumbhe

original: 09,019.014c sa tais tu viddhaḥ paramadvipo raṇe;
analyzed: sa taiḥ tu viddhaḥ parama dvipaḥ raṇe
tadā parāvṛtya bhṛśam pradudruve
tam nāga rājam sahasā praṇunnam
vidrāvyamāṇam ca nigṛhya śālvaḥ
tottra aṅkuśaiḥ preṣayām āsa tūrṇam
pāñcāla rājasya ratham pradiśya
dṛṣṭvā āpatantam sahasā tu nāgam
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sva rathāt śīghram eva
gadām pragṛhya āśu javena vīro
bhūmim prapannaḥ bhaya vihvala aṅgaḥ
sa tam ratham hema vibhūṣita aṅgam
sa aśvam sa sūtam sahasā vimṛdya
utkṣipya hastena tadā mahā dvipo
vipothayām āsa vasuṃdharā tale
pāñcāla rājasya sutam sa dṛṣṭvā
tadā arditam nāga vareṇa tena
tam abhyadhāvat sahasā javena

original: bhīmaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca śineś ca naptā
analyzed: bhīmaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca śineḥ ca naptā
śaraiḥ ca vegam sahasā nigṛhya
tasya abhitas bhyāpatataḥ gajasya
sa saṃgṛhītaḥ rathibhiḥ gajaḥ vai
cacāla taiḥ vāryamāṇaḥ ca saṃkhye
tatas pṛṣatkān pravavarṣa rājā
sūryaḥ yathā raśmi jālam samantāt
tena āśugaiḥ vadhyamānāḥ ratha oghāḥ
pradudruvuḥ tatra tatas tu sarve
tat karma śālvasya samīkṣya sarve
pāñcāla matsyāḥ nṛpa sṛñjayāḥ ca
hāhākāraiḥ nādayantaḥ sma yuddhe
dvipam samantāt rurudhuḥ nara agryāḥ
pāñcāla rājaḥ tvaritaḥ tu śūraḥ
gadām pragṛhya acala śṛṅga kalpām
asaṃbhramam bhārata śatrughātī
javena vīraḥ nusasāra nāgam
nāgam dharaṇīdhara ābham
madam sravantam jalada prakāśam
gadām samāvidhya bhṛśam jaghāna
pāñcāla rājasya sutaḥ tarasvī
sa bhinna kumbhaḥ sahasā vinadya
mukhāt prabhūtam kṣatajam vimuñcan
papāta nāgaḥ dharaṇīdhara ābhaḥ
kṣiti prakampāt calitaḥ yathā adriḥ
nipātyamāne tu tadā gaja indre
hāhākṛte tava putrasya sainye
sa śālva rājasya śinipravīro
jahāra bhallena śiraḥ śitena
hṛta uttamāṅgaḥ yudhi sātvatena
papāta bhūmau saha nāga rājñā
yathā adri śṛṅgam su mahat praṇunnam
vajreṇa devādhipa coditena
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 09,020.001a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre śālve samitiśobhane
analyzed: tasmin tu nihate śūre śālve samiti śobhane
tava abhajyat balam vegāt vātena iva mahā drumaḥ

original: 09,020.002a tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tat prabhagnam balam dṛṣṭvā kṛtavarmā mahā rathaḥ
dadhāra samare śūraḥ śatru sainyam mahā balaḥ

original: 09,020.003a saṃnivṛttās tu te śūrā dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
analyzed: saṃnivṛttāḥ tu te śūrāḥ dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave

original: 09,020.003c śailopamaṃ sthitaṃ rājan kīryamāṇaṃ śarair yudhi
analyzed: śaila upamam sthitam rājan kīryamāṇam śaraiḥ yudhi

original: 09,020.004a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas pravavṛte yuddham kurūṇām pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
nivṛttānām mahā rāja mṛtyum kṛtvā nivartanam

original: 09,020.005a tatrāścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ sātvatasya paraiḥ saha
analyzed: tatra āścaryam abhūt yuddham sātvatasya paraiḥ saha

original: 09,020.005c yad eko vārayām āsa pāṇḍusenāṃ durāsadām
analyzed: yat ekaḥ vārayām āsa pāṇḍu senām durāsadām
teṣām anyonya suhṛdām kṛte karmaṇi duṣkare
siṃha nādaḥ prahṛṣṭānām divaḥ spṛś su mahān abhūt
tena śabdena vitrastān pāñcālān bharata ṛṣabha
śineḥ naptā mahā bāhuḥ anvapadyata sātyakiḥ
śatavarmāṇam ati ugram mahā vīram mahā balam
sa samāsādya rājānam kṣemadhūrtim mahā balam
saptabhiḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ anayat yama sādanam

original: 09,020.009a tam āyāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ pravapantaṃ śitāñ śarān
analyzed: tam āyāntam mahā bāhum pravapantam śitām śarān
javena abhyapatat dhīmān hārdikyaḥ śini puṃgavam

original: 09,020.010a tau siṃhāv iva nardantau dhanvinau rathināṃ varau
analyzed: tau siṃhau iva nardantau dhanvinau rathinām varau
anyonyam abhyadhāvetām śastra pravara dhāriṇau

original: 09,020.011a pāṇḍavāḥ saha pāñcālair yodhāś cānye nṛpottamāḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍavāḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ yodhāḥ ca anye nṛpa uttamāḥ
prekṣakāḥ samapadyanta tayoḥ puruṣa siṃhayoḥ
nārācaiḥ vatsadantaiḥ ca vṛṣṇi andhaka mahā rathau
abhijaghnatuḥ anyonyam prahṛṣṭau iva kuñjarau
carantau vividhān mārgān hārdikya śini puṃgavau
muhur antardadhāte tau bāṇa vṛṣṭyā parasparam
cāpa vega bala uddhūtān mārgaṇān vṛṣṇi siṃhayoḥ
ākāśe samapaśyāma pataṃgān iva śīghragān
tam ekam satya karmāṇam āsādya hṛdika ātmajaḥ

original: 09,020.015c avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
analyzed: avidhyat niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ caturbhiḥ caturaḥ hayān

original: 09,020.016a sa dīrghabāhuḥ saṃkruddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: sa dīrgha bāhuḥ saṃkruddhaḥ tottra arditaḥ iva dvipaḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ kṛtavarmāṇam avidhyat parama iṣubhiḥ
tatas pūrṇa āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtavarmā śilā śitaiḥ

original: 09,020.017c sātyakiṃ tribhir āhatya dhanur ekena cicchide
analyzed: sātyakim tribhiḥ āhatya dhanuḥ ekena cicchide
nikṛttam tat dhanuḥ śreṣṭham apāsya śini puṃgavaḥ

original: 09,020.018c anyad ādatta vegena śaineyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: anyat ādatta vegena śaineyaḥ sa śaram dhanuḥ
tat ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭham variṣṭhaḥ sarva dhanvinām
āropya ca mahā vīryaḥ mahā buddhiḥ mahā balaḥ
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ dhanuṣaḥ chedanam kṛtavarmaṇā
kupitaḥ tirathaḥ śīghram kṛtavarmāṇam abhyayāt
tatas su niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ śini puṃgavaḥ

original: 09,020.021c jaghāna sūtam aśvāṃś ca dhvajaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: jaghāna sūtam aśvān ca dhvajam ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
tatas rājan mahā iṣvāsaḥ kṛtavarmā mahā rathaḥ
hata aśva sūtam saṃprekṣya ratham hema pariṣkṛtam
roṣeṇa mahatā āviṣṭaḥ śūlam udyamya māriṣa
cikṣepa bhuja vegena jighāṃsuḥ śini puṃgavam

original: 09,020.024a tac chūlaṃ sātvato hy ājau nirbhidya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tat śūlam sātvataḥ hi ājau nirbhidya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 09,020.024c cūrṇitaṃ pātayām āsa mohayann iva mādhavam
analyzed: cūrṇitam pātayām āsa mohayan iva mādhavam
pareṇa bhallena hṛdi enam samatāḍayat
sa yuddhe yuyudhānena hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ
kṛtavarmā kṛtāstreṇa dharaṇīm anvapadyata
tasmin sātyakinā vīre dvairathe virathīkṛte
samapadyata sarveṣām sainyānām su mahat bhayam
putrasya tava ca atyartham viṣādaḥ samapadyata
hata sūte hata aśve ca virathe kṛtavarmaṇi
hata aśvam ca samālakṣya hata sūtam ariṃdamam
abhyadhāvat kṛpaḥ rājam jighāṃsuḥ śini puṃgavam
tam āropya rathopasthe miṣatām sarva dhanvinām
apovāha mahā bāhuḥ tūrṇam āyodhanāt api
śaineye dhiṣṭhite rājan virathe kṛtavarmaṇi
duryodhana balam sarvam punar āsīt parāṅmukham
tad pare na avabudhyanta sainyena rajasā āvṛte

original: 09,020.031c tāvakāḥ pradrutā rājan duryodhanam ṛte nṛpam
analyzed: tāvakāḥ pradrutāḥ rājan duryodhanam ṛte nṛpam

original: 09,020.032a duryodhanas tu saṃprekṣya bhagnaṃ svabalam antikāt
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tu saṃprekṣya bhagnam sva balam antikāt
javena abhyapatat tūrṇam sarvān ca ekaḥ nyavārayat

original: 09,020.033a pāṇḍūṃś ca sarvān saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
analyzed: pāṇḍūn ca sarvān saṃkruddhaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam ca pārṣatam

original: 09,020.033c śikhaṇḍinaṃ draupadeyān pāñcālānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥ
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinam draupadeyān pāñcālānām ca ye gaṇāḥ

original: 09,020.034a kekayān somakāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś caiva māriṣa
analyzed: kekayān somakān ca eva pāñcālān ca eva māriṣa

evam vyutkrānta dharmeṇa vyutkramya samayam hataḥ
aśvatthāmā mahābhāgaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ

original: 09,063.028c kṛpaḥ śāradvataś caiva vaktavyā vacanān mama
analyzed: kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ ca eva vaktavyāḥ vacanāt mama

original: 09,063.029c viśvāsaṃ samayaghnānāṃ na yūyaṃ gantum arhatha
analyzed: viśvāsam samaya ghnānām na yūyam gantum arhatha

original: 09,063.030a vātikāṃś cābravīd rājā putras te satyavikramaḥ
analyzed: vātikān ca abravīt rājā putraḥ te satya vikramaḥ
adharmāt bhīmasenena nihataḥ ham yathā raṇe

original: 09,063.031a so 'haṃ droṇaṃ svargagataṃ śalyakarṇāv ubhau tathā
analyzed: saḥ ham droṇam svarga gatam śalya karṇau ubhau tathā
vṛṣasenam mahā vīryam śakunim ca api saubalam
jalasaṃdham mahā vīryam bhagadattam ca pārthivam

duḥśāsana purogān ca bhrātṝn ātma samān tathā

original: 09,063.033c dauḥśāsaniṃ ca vikrāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cātmajāv ubhau
analyzed: dauḥśāsanim ca vikrāntam lakṣmaṇam ca ātmajau ubhau

original: 09,063.034a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca subahūn madīyāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: etān ca anyān ca su bahūn madīyān ca sahasraśas

original: 09,063.035a kathaṃ bhrātṝn hatāñ śrutvā bhartāraṃ ca svasā mama
analyzed: katham bhrātṝn hatām śrutvā bhartāram ca svasā mama

original: 09,063.036a snuṣābhiḥ prasnuṣābhiś ca vṛddho rājā pitā mama
analyzed: snuṣābhiḥ prasnuṣābhiḥ ca vṛddhaḥ rājā pitā mama
gāndhārī sahitaḥ krośan kām gatim pratipatsyate
nūnam lakṣmaṇa mātā api hata putrā hata īśvarā
vināśam yāsyati kṣipram kalyāṇī pṛthu locanā
yadi jānāti cārvākaḥ parivrāj vāc viśāradaḥ
kariṣyati mahābhāgaḥ dhruvam saḥ upacitim mama
samantapañcake puṇye triṣu lokeṣu viśrute

original: 09,063.039c ahaṃ nidhanam āsādya lokān prāpsyāmi śāśvatān
analyzed: aham nidhanam āsādya lokān prāpsyāmi śāśvatān

original: 09,063.040c pralāpaṃ nṛpateḥ śrutvā vidravanti diśo daśa
analyzed: pralāpam nṛpateḥ śrutvā vidravanti diśaḥ daśa
sa sāgara vanā ghorā pṛthivī sa carācarā
cacāla atha sa nirhrādā diśaḥ ca eva āvilāḥ abhavan
te droṇaputram āsādya yathāvṛttam nyavedayan
vyavahāram gadā yuddhe pārthivasya ca ghātanam

original: 09,063.043a tad ākhyāya tataḥ sarve droṇaputrasya bhārata
analyzed: tat ākhyāya tatas sarve droṇaputrasya bhārata

original: 09,063.043c dhyātvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ jagmur ārtā yathāgatam
analyzed: dhyātvā ca su ciram kālam jagmuḥ ārtāḥ yathāgatam

original: 09,064.001a vātikānāṃ sakāśāt tu śrutvā duryodhanaṃ hatam
analyzed: vātikānām sakāśāt tu śrutvā duryodhanam hatam
hata śiṣṭāḥ tatas rājan kauravāṇām mahā rathāḥ

original: 09,064.002c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
analyzed: aśvatthāmā kṛpaḥ ca eva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
tvaritāḥ javanaiḥ aśvaiḥ āyodhanam upāgaman
tatra apaśyat mahātmānam dhārtarāṣṭram nipātitam
prabhagnam vāyu vegena mahā śālam yathā vane
bhūmau viveṣṭamānam tam rudhireṇa samukṣitam
mahā gajam iva araṇye vyādhena vinipātitam
vivartamānam bahuśas rudhira ogha pariplutam
yadṛcchayā nipatitam cakram āditya gocaram
mahā vāta samutthena saṃśuṣkam iva sāgaram
pūrṇa candram iva vyomni tuṣāra āvṛta maṇḍalam
reṇu dhvastam dīrgha bhujam mātaṅga sama vikramam

original: 09,064.007c vṛtaṃ bhūtagaṇair ghoraiḥ kravyādaiś ca samantataḥ
analyzed: vṛtam bhūta gaṇaiḥ ghoraiḥ kravyādaiḥ ca samantataḥ
yathā dhanam lipsamānaiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ nṛpati sattamam
bhrukuṭī kṛta vaktra antam krodhāt udvṛtta cakṣuṣam

original: 09,064.008c sāmarṣaṃ taṃ naravyāghraṃ vyāghraṃ nipatitaṃ yathā
analyzed: sa amarṣam tam nara vyāghram vyāghram nipatitam yathā

original: 09,064.009a te tu dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsā bhūtale patitaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: te tu dṛṣṭvā mahā iṣvāsāḥ bhū tale patitam nṛpam
moham abhyāgaman sarve kṛpa prabhṛtayaḥ rathāḥ
avatīrya rathebhyaḥ tu prādravan rāja saṃnidhau

original: 09,064.010c duryodhanaṃ ca saṃprekṣya sarve bhūmāv upāviśan
analyzed: duryodhanam ca saṃprekṣya sarve bhūmau upāviśan
tatas drauṇiḥ mahā rāja bāṣpa pūrṇa īkṣaṇaḥ śvasan

original: 09,064.012a na nūnaṃ vidyate 'sahyaṃ mānuṣye kiṃ cid eva hi
analyzed: na nūnam vidyate sahyam mānuṣye kim cit eva hi

original: 09,064.012c yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra śeṣe pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
analyzed: yatra tvam puruṣa vyāghra śeṣe pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ

original: 09,064.013a bhūtvā hi nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ samājñāpya ca medinīm
analyzed: bhūtvā hi nṛpatiḥ pūrvam samājñāpya ca medinīm

original: 09,064.013c katham eko 'dya rājendra tiṣṭhase nirjane vane

original: 09,064.014a duḥśāsanaṃ na paśyāmi nāpi karṇaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: duḥśāsanam na paśyāmi na api karṇam mahā ratham

original: 09,064.014c nāpi tān suhṛdaḥ sarvān kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
analyzed: nā api tān suhṛdaḥ sarvān kim idam bharata ṛṣabha

original: 09,064.015a duḥkhaṃ nūnaṃ kṛtāntasya gatiṃ jñātuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: duḥkham nūnam kṛtāntasya gatim jñātum katham cana

original: 09,064.015c lokānāṃ ca bhavān yatra śete pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ
analyzed: lokānām ca bhavān yatra śete pāṃsuṣu rūṣitaḥ

original: 09,064.016c satṛṇaṃ grasate pāṃsuṃ paśya kālasya paryayam
analyzed: sa tṛṇam grasate pāṃsum paśya kālasya paryayam

original: 09,064.017a kva te tad amalaṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ kva ca pārthiva
analyzed: kva te tat amalam chatram vyajanam kva ca pārthiva

original: 09,064.017c sā ca te mahatī senā kva gatā pārthivottama
analyzed: sā ca te mahatī senā kva gatā pārthiva uttama
gaja aśva ratha saṃkulā
sāmanta rāja saṃyuktā
bhrātaraḥ te mahā rāja vīrya śakra samāḥ yudhi
śatrūṇām ca nihantāraḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ

original: 09,064.017d*0390_03 kva gatāḥ pārthivendrādya saubhrātraṃ ca samāśritam
analyzed: kva gatāḥ pārthiva indra adya saubhrātram ca samāśritam
tava putrāḥ mahābhāga lakṣmaṇa ādyāḥ mahā rathāḥ
pūrṇa indu sadṛśāḥ vīrāḥ śānti saundarya kāntibhiḥ
kṛtavān nṛpa śārdūla jayanta sama vikramam

original: 09,064.018c yad vai lokagurur bhūtvā bhavān etāṃ daśāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yat vai loka guruḥ bhūtvā bhavān etām daśām gataḥ
adhruvā sarva martyeṣu dhruvam śrīḥ upalakṣyate

original: 09,064.019b*0391_01 dhruveva bhāti sarvatra nityaṃ mohakarī nṛṇām
analyzed: dhruvā iva bhāti sarvatra nityam moha karī nṛṇām

original: 09,064.019b*0391_03 na tu viśvasen nityāṃ vai hy adhruvā vai svabhāvataḥ
analyzed: na tu viśvaset nityām vai hi adhruvā vai svabhāvataḥ
bhavataḥ vyasanam dṛṣṭvā śakra vispardhinaḥ bhṛśam

original: 09,064.019d*0392_01 imaṃ lokam anityaṃ vā hy adyāhaṃ samacintaye
analyzed: imam lokam anityam vā hi adya aham samacintaye

original: 09,064.020a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitasya viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā duḥkhitasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 09,064.020c uvāca rājan putras te prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca rājan putraḥ te prāpta kālam idam vacaḥ

original: 09,064.021a vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyāṃ śokajaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjan
analyzed: vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyām śoka jam bāṣpam utsṛjan

original: 09,064.021c kṛpādīn sa tadā vīrān sarvān eva narādhipaḥ
analyzed: kṛpa ādīn sa tadā vīrān sarvān eva narādhipaḥ
īdṛśaḥ martya dharmaḥ yam dhātrā nirdiṣṭaḥ ucyate
vināśaḥ sarva bhūtānām kāla paryāya kāritaḥ

original: 09,064.023a so 'yaṃ māṃ samanuprāptaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatāṃ hi yaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam mām samanuprāptaḥ pratyakṣam bhavatām hi yaḥ

original: 09,064.024a diṣṭyā nāhaṃ parāvṛtto yuddhe kasyāṃ cid āpadi
analyzed: diṣṭyā na aham parāvṛttaḥ yuddhe kasyām cit āpadi

original: 09,064.024b*0393_01 diṣṭyāhaṃ no nṛpatibhir nirjito na kadā cana

original: 09,064.024b*0393_02 diṣṭyā mayā nirjitās te rājāno bahuśo yudhi

original: 09,064.025a utsāhaś ca kṛto nityaṃ mayā diṣṭyā yuyutsatā

original: 09,064.025b*0395_01 diṣṭyā hatā gajā yuddhe sagajārohakā bhṛśam
analyzed: diṣṭyā hatāḥ gajāḥ yuddhe sa gaja ārohakāḥ bhṛśam
diṣṭyā aśvāḥ deśa jāḥ sarve kṛtinaḥ vega śālinaḥ
kuśalaiḥ sādibhiḥ sārdham nihatāḥ raṇa mūrdhani
diṣṭyā raṇe vinihatāḥ rathāḥ hema pariṣkṛtāḥ
rathibhiḥ yuddha kuśalaiḥ sārdham vidalitaiḥ śaraiḥ
diṣṭyā yodhāḥ dhanuṣmantaḥ sarve yuddha viśāradāḥ
śara nirbhinna sarva aṅgāḥ samare patitāḥ abhavan

original: 09,064.025b*0395_08 diṣṭyā mamāyudhāny āśu nāśam āyānti vai kṣaṇāt
analyzed: diṣṭyā mama āyudhāni āśu nāśam āyānti vai kṣaṇāt

original: 09,064.026a diṣṭyā ca vo 'haṃ paśyāmi muktān asmāj janakṣayāt
analyzed: diṣṭyā ca vaḥ ham paśyāmi muktān asmāt jana kṣayāt

original: 09,064.026b*0396_01 svasti haṃto tv ahaṃ yuddhe nihatajñātibāndhavaḥ
analyzed: svasti haṃto tu aham yuddhe nihata jñāti bāndhavaḥ

original: 09,064.026c svastiyuktāṃś ca kalyāṃś ca tan me priyam anuttamam
analyzed: svasti yuktān ca kalyān ca tat me priyam anuttamam

original: 09,064.027c yadi vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ vo jitā lokā mayākṣayāḥ
analyzed: yadi vedāḥ pramāṇam vaḥ jitāḥ lokāḥ mayā akṣayāḥ

original: 09,064.028c tena na cyāvitaś cāhaṃ kṣatradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
analyzed: tena na cyāvitaḥ ca aham kṣatra dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt

original: 09,064.029a sa mayā samanuprāpto nāsmi śocyaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: sa mayā samanuprāptaḥ na asmi śocyaḥ katham cana

original: 09,064.029b*0397_01 tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rājendra vartate vijayo mama
analyzed: tathā tu dṛṣṭvā rāja indra vartate vijayaḥ mama

original: 09,064.029e yatitaṃ vijaye nityaṃ daivaṃ tu duratikramam
analyzed: yatitam vijaye nityam daivam tu duratikramam

original: 09,064.030c tūṣṇīṃ babhūva rājendra rujāsau vihvalo bhṛśam
analyzed: tūṣṇīm babhūva rāja indra rujā asau vihvalaḥ bhṛśam

original: 09,064.031c drauṇiḥ krodhena jajvāla yathā vahnir jagatkṣaye
analyzed: drauṇiḥ krodhena jajvāla yathā vahniḥ jagat kṣaye

original: 09,064.032a sa tu krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pāṇau pāṇiṃ nipīḍya ca
analyzed: sa tu krodha samāviṣṭaḥ pāṇau pāṇim nipīḍya ca

original: 09,064.033a pitā me nihataḥ kṣudraiḥ sunṛśaṃsena karmaṇā
analyzed: pitā me nihataḥ kṣudraiḥ su nṛśaṃsena karmaṇā

original: 09,064.033c na tathā tena tapyāmi yathā rājaṃs tvayādya vai
analyzed: na tathā tena tapyāmi yathā rājan tvayā adya vai

original: 09,064.034a śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mahyaṃ satyena vadataḥ prabho
analyzed: śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ mahyam satyena vadataḥ prabho

original: 09,064.034b*0398_02 tava priyaṃ kariṣyāmi kṛtvā kāryam anuttamam
analyzed: tava priyam kariṣyāmi kṛtvā kāryam anuttamam

original: 09,064.034b*0398_03 īpsitaṃ manasā rājan yathecchasi tathā vada
analyzed: īpsitam manasā rājan yathā icchasi tathā vada

original: 09,064.034d*0399_01 śapeyaṃ rājaśārdūla pādābhyāṃ mama vai pituḥ
analyzed: śapeyam rāja śārdūla pādābhyām mama vai pituḥ
adya aham sarva pāñcālān vāsudevasya paśyataḥ
sṛñjayān ca eva sarvaśas
sarvān ca nṛpatīn rājan dhṛṣṭadyumna purogamān
sa sainyān yudhi śeṣān ca
sarva upāyaiḥ hi neṣyāmi pretarāja niveśanam
adya rātrau mahā rāja nihaniṣyāmi pāṇḍavān

original: 09,064.035e anujñāṃ tu mahārāja bhavān me dātum arhati
analyzed: anujñām tu mahā rāja bhavān me dātum arhati

original: 09,064.036a iti śrutvā tu vacanaṃ droṇaputrasya kauravaḥ
analyzed: iti śrutvā tu vacanam droṇaputrasya kauravaḥ

original: 09,064.036b*0402_01 tac chrutvā vacanaṃ drauṇer dhṛtarāṣṭra tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam drauṇeḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra tava ātmajaḥ
manasaḥ prīti jananam kṛpam vacanam abravīt
ācārya śīghram kalaśam jala pūrṇam samānaya

original: 09,064.037a sa tad vacanam ājñāya rājño brāhmaṇasattamaḥ
analyzed: sa tat vacanam ājñāya rājñaḥ brāhmaṇa sattamaḥ

original: 09,064.038a tam abravīn mahārāja putras tava viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tam abravīt mahā rāja putraḥ tava viśām pate

original: 09,064.038e senāpatyena bhadraṃ te mama ced icchasi priyam
analyzed: senāpatyena bhadram te mama ced icchasi priyam

original: 09,064.039c vartatā kṣatradharmeṇa hy evaṃ dharmavido viduḥ
analyzed: vartatā kṣatra dharmeṇa hi evam dharma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: 09,064.040a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tataḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu vacanam śrutvā kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ tatas
drauṇim rājñaḥ niyogena senāpatye bhyaṣecayat
saḥ bhiṣiktaḥ mahā rāja pariṣvajya nṛpa uttamam
prayayau siṃhanādena diśaḥ sarvāḥ vinādayan
duryodhanaḥ pi rāja indra śoṇita ogha pariplutaḥ

original: 09,064.043a apakramya tu te tūrṇaṃ tasmād āyodhanān nṛpa
analyzed: apakramya tu te tūrṇam tasmāt āyodhanāt nṛpa

original: 09,064.043d*0403_02 āste rājā cintayānas teṣām āgamanaṃ prati
analyzed: āste rājā cintayānaḥ teṣām āgamanam prati

original: 09,064.043d*0403_04 brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścād vaktāraṃ ca supūjayet
